about_the_game:
Welcome to It’s Only Money: Minimum Wage Edition*, featuring the tutorial and a bite-sized, single-player, 15 minute slice of our larger open world multiplayer experience.

Throughout your time in the demo, you’ll be offered random odd jobs that aim to funnel you into experiencing one of the many things Rockhaven has to offer. For each job, you’ll be rewarded with cash that you can spend on clothes, weapons, car mods and more, but most importantly: You’ll be graded at the end of the 15 minutes based on how much money you make. Based on your grade, you can unlock some sweet stuff in the full version of It’s Only Money!

Play through the demo as many times as you like, and engage with a bunch of random jobs to get the full Minimum Wage experience. Or, y’know just ignore the jobs in general and cruise around on your 15 minute timer. You do you.

We’ve crafted a huge, unpredictable game. We hope you find something that gives you a few laughs.

Good luck on the streets of Rockhaven, and as always:
Enjoy your life!



*Steam made us change the name to It’s Only Money Demo, which is boring. This is the Minimum Wage Edition and don’t you forget it, Wagey

name: It's Only Money Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 (10th Gen) or Ryzen 3 (3000 series) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 or AMD Radeon RX 590 (8GB) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 (11th Gen) or Ryzen 5 (5000 series) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 3070 or AMD Radeon RX 6700-XT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: The mayor of Rockhaven threw you down a hole into the Undercity. Why? Net worth too low. In this low-life simulation demo, emerge to the surface to steal from the rich, fight tycoons and reclaim the city block by block. Buy houses, businesses and whatever your materialistic heart desires!
